Games.title: Rainbow Six Siege
Games.description: Rainbow Six Siege is a high-precision, tactical shooter that priortises careful planning teamwork and finely tuned tactical play

Games.title: Valorant
Games.description: Valorant is a tactical shooting game involving two teams with 5 players in each team.

Games.title: League of Legends
Games.description: League of Legends is a team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the other's base

Games.title: Apex Legends
Games.description: Apex Legends is an online multiplayer battle royale game featuring squads of three players using pre-made characters with distinctive abilitites, called 'Legends', similar to those of hero shooters
